sentences.en: AE : Those are deep issues to delve into.
sentences.cn: 那些是必须钻研探索的深奥课题.

sentences.en: As an Aries, sometimes you don't delve down to their emotional depth.
sentences.cn: 作为一牧羊座, 有时,你达不到他们的感情深度.

sentences.en: Delve a little deeper if you really want to know the score.
sentences.cn: 如果真想知道事情的个中缘由就需要深一层的钻研了.

sentences.en: Delve into the technical world and learn more about the vehicle of your choice.
sentences.cn: 深入技术世界,洞悉更多您对车辆的选择.

sentences.en: For many people, thrift stores offer an easy way to delve into frugal fashion.
sentences.cn: 对很多人来说, 廉价店为挖掘出节约的时尚提供了一条容易的道路.

sentences.en: He had a considerable Elizabethan library to delve in.
sentences.cn: 他拥有相当多的伊丽莎白时期的藏书供其钻研.

sentences.en: I, Earth Mother, would like to delve into Mila and Oa's personal experiences in ascension.
sentences.cn: 我, 地球母亲, 很愿意深入研究Mila和Oa在提升中的个人经历.

sentences.en: I'd like to delve further into your response: " Hard work never killed anybody ".
sentences.cn: 你认为, “ 勤奋的工作从来累不死人. ” 我愿对此做进一步的探讨.

sentences.en: If you're interested in a subject, use the Internet to delve deeper.
sentences.cn: 如果对某一主题感兴趣，就上网进一步深入研究。

sentences.en: To delve neural network spectrophotometry appling to content determination of compound preparation.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨神经网络光度法用于复方制剂的含量测定.

sentences.en: Tormented by her ignorance, Jenny delves into her mother's past.
sentences.cn: 珍妮为自己不了解真相而痛苦，她开始深入调查母亲的过去。

sentences.en: We need to delve more deeply into these questions.
sentences.cn: 这些是我们想进一步了解的.

sentences.en: We should not delve too deeply into this painful matter.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该过分深究这件痛苦的事.

sentences.en: We will delve into all three areas in Part 2.
sentences.cn: 我们会在第2部分详细讨论这些问题.

sentences.en: We would like to delve into why this is so that ascending initiates will better understand.
sentences.cn: 我们很愿意深入研究为何如此,以便提升门徒可以更好地理解.

sentences.en: We'll delve into using these, and others, later on.
sentences.cn: 我们将在稍后再研究这些参数以及其他一些参数的使用.

trans.tran_en: to try to find more information about someone or something
